name: The mithril leggings of Essence
data: It decreases the users strength slightly.
It increases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It decreases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has tiny armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration slightly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
